name: slovakia_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetches Slovakia Songs chart information for a given date range.

range.description: The range of songs to retrieve from the chart.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the chart information, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
